p: The protective effect of A. absinthium herb extracts on the haemolysis of human erythrocytes has also been studied. Absorbance of a red blood cell solution with the addition of sodium chloride was observed in the absence or presence of a crude aqueous extract of the A. absinthium herb. The extract from the plant proved to be a good stabilizer of erythrocyte membranes, which can protect cells from hypotonic shock [ 101].
